component.name: qrdomterm
component.summary: A Qt-based UI for the Domterm Terminal Emulator
component.p: A terminal emulator based on web technologies, with a Qt front-end. You can "print" images, tables, and other HTML forms. Supports 24-bit color; xterm mouse events; solid xterm emulation. Good handling of Unicode, CJK wide characters, and IME support. Builtin input line editor with history. Styling using CSS. Hide/unhide a commands's output.
